1.title: Dry Ice Popsicles
1.description: Ever wanted your popsicle to be so cold it looks like it is from the future? You are in luck. We will make one for you.

0.title: Unicef
0.description: Donate to a worthy cause. Unicef is an international children's organization.
0.ethics: 98% of all incoming donations go directly to communities whose children are suffering. Only 2% of donations are reserved for operational costs.
0.mission: Children across the globe have a right to live a healthy life. Do your part to make that a reality.

1.title: Astronauts Without Borders
1.description: Former space travelers educate kids about the new frontier and the value of exploration.
1.ethics: Astronauts donate their time free of charge, and all donations are used to produce and distribute educational materials as well as coordinate educational events.
1.mission: Inspire all children to pursue a life of exploration, curiosity, and adventure.
